author: B for Beretta ❤️‍🔥
text: Instead we should search for that, in which we could find.. & that is what drives us. The psychological definition of drive is “an aroused state of psychological tension that typically arises from a need. A drive, such as hunger or thirst, motivates the organism to act in ways-

author: B for Beretta ❤️‍🔥
text: One may spend a great deal of time trying to figure out how to “find” their purpose. The definition of purpose is the “reason for which something is done or created or for which something exists.” If you didn’t ask to be here, how could you ever possibly find an answer to that?
